001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003import org.slf4j.Logger;
004import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
006
007/**
008 * Represents the NEXT ID which can be used for a transaction in communicating with the pump.
009 * We read the current txId, send a message with it, and then increment it.
010 */
011public class TransactionId {
012    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(TransactionId.class);
013    private int txId = 0;
014
015    public void set(int i) {
016        if (i < 0 || i > 255) {
017            i = 0;
018        }
019        if (i != txId + 1) {
020            log.debug("set: old " + txId + " new " + i);
021        }
022        txId = i;
023    }
024
025    public void increment() {
026        set(txId + 1);
027    }
028
029    public void reset() {
030        set(0);
031    }
032
033    public byte get() {
034        return (byte) txId;
035    }
036
037    public String toString() {
038        return "TransactionId(txId="+txId+")";
039    }
040}
